content: my hat measures approx 11 in circumference and fits my cat approx 10 lbs and dog approx 14lbs depending on your size of dog/cat you could probably go up or down a hook size to adjust it to fit on round 1 for the hat you can easily chain 37 and half_double_crochet in the second chain from hook and in each chain st around instead of the fhdc but the fhdc will stretch more
